alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 1:37PM MST until January 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 15 inches possible, highest across the Wasatch Back. * WHERE...Wasatch Back. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 5 AM MST Thursday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Thursday night through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of light snow are expected on Friday with additional light amounts.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
